transform_def.name: designed09
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) l = lerp(-p_in.y / cos(p_in.x), atan2(p_in.y, p_in.x / p_in.y), if r < halfinvpi() then -length(p_in) else 1 / length(p_in) * fourpi()) z = abs((p_in.x * p_in.y) * tan(l) * sin(length(p_in)) * if l > r && -l > r then l else r) con1 = z < r con2 = z > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
